00010 #if !defined(Apoxi_NiSharedPtr_hpp)
00011 #define Apoxi_NiSharedPtr_hpp
00012 
00013 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00014 #include <Auxiliary/Macros.hpp>
00015 
00021 #define NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00022 
00038 template <typename X>
00039 class NiSharedPtr
00040 {
00041 public:
00043     explicit NiSharedPtr(X* p = 0) // Allocate a new item reference.
00044         : m_itemRef(0) { if (p) m_itemRef = new ItemRef(p); }
00045 
00047     ~NiSharedPtr();
00048 
00050     NiSharedPtr(const NiSharedPtr &r)
00051         { Acquire(r.m_itemRef); }
00052 
00054     NiSharedPtr& operator=(const NiSharedPtr &r);
00055 
00056 #ifndef NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00057     template <typename Y> friend class NiSharedPtr;
00058     template <typename Y> NiSharedPtr(const NiSharedPtr<Y>& r)
00059         { Acquire(r.m_itemRef); }
00060     template <typename Y> NiSharedPtr<X>& operator=(const NiSharedPtr<Y> &r);
00061 #endif // NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00062 
00070     X& operator*() const
00071     {
00072         ASSERT_DEBUG_HOST(m_itemRef && m_itemRef->m_ptr);
00073         return *m_itemRef->m_ptr;
00074     }
00075 
00083     X* operator->() const
00084     {
00085         ASSERT_DEBUG_HOST(m_itemRef && m_itemRef->m_ptr);
00086         return m_itemRef->m_ptr;
00087     }
00088 
00090     X* Get() const { return m_itemRef ? m_itemRef->m_ptr : 0; }
00091 
00093     BOOLEAN IsValid() const { return Get() != 0; }
00094 
00096     BOOLEAN Unique() const
00097         { return (m_itemRef ? m_itemRef->m_count == 1 : FALSE); }
00098 
00101     void Release()
00102     {   // Decrement the counter and delete the reference counted object if the
00103         // counter is 0.
00104         if (m_itemRef) {
00105             if (--m_itemRef->m_count == 0) {
00106                 delete m_itemRef->m_ptr;
00107                 delete m_itemRef;
00108             }
00109             m_itemRef = 0;
00110         }
00111     }
00112 
00113 private:
00116     struct ItemRef {
00117         ItemRef(X *p = 0, UINT c = 1) : m_ptr(p), m_count(c) {}
00118         X *m_ptr;
00119         UINT m_count;
00120     } *m_itemRef;
00121 
00123     void Acquire(ItemRef *itemRef)
00124     {   // Increment the counter.
00125         m_itemRef = itemRef;
00126         if (itemRef) ++itemRef->m_count;
00127     }
00128 };
00129 
00130 template <typename X>
00131 NiSharedPtr<X>::~NiSharedPtr()
00132 {
00133     Release();
00134 }
00135 
00136 template <typename X>
00137 NiSharedPtr<X>& NiSharedPtr<X>::operator=(const NiSharedPtr<X> &r)
00138 {
00139     if (this != &r) {
00140         Release();
00141         Acquire(r.m_itemRef);
00142     }
00143     return *this;
00144 }
00145 
00146 #ifndef NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00147 
00148 template <typename X>
00149 template <typename Y>
00150 NiSharedPtr<X>& NiSharedPtr<X>::operator=(const NiSharedPtr<Y> &r)
00151 {
00152     if (this != &r) {
00153         Release();
00154         Acquire(r.m_itemRef);
00155     }
00156     return *this;
00157 }
00158 
00159 #endif // NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00160 
00164 template<typename X, typename Y>
00165 BOOLEAN operator==(const NiSharedPtr<X> &lhs, const NiSharedPtr<Y> &rhs)
00166 {
00167     return lhs.Get() == rhs.Get();
00168 }
00169 
00173 template<typename X, typename Y>
00174 BOOLEAN operator!=(const NiSharedPtr<X> &lhs, const NiSharedPtr<Y> &rhs)
00175 {
00176     return lhs.Get() != rhs.Get();
00177 }

00179 #endif  // Apoxi_NiSharedPtr_hpp
